member.name: QCMINFO
member.summary: Contains information for merging menu items into Windows Explorer menus.

member.name: QCMINFO.hmenu
member.summary: [in] The handle of the menu where the new commands are to be added.

member.name: QCMINFO.indexMenu
member.summary: [in] The zero-based index where the first menu item are to be inserted.

member.name: QCMINFO.idCmdFirst
member.summary: [in, out] On entry, this member contains the first available ID to be used for the context menu. On exit, it contains the last ID added plus one.

member.name: QCMINFO.idCmdLast
member.summary: [in] The maximum value for a menu item identifier. The difference between the input value of idCmdFirst and idCmdLast is the maximum number of menu items that can be added.
